jd:
Dear Partners,

Please share me the resume for Business Analyst with WMS experience. Looking for candidate from local GA only.

Job Title: Business Analyst
Location: Alpharetta, GA
Note: In-Person Interview is mandatory.
Hybrid – (3 Days onsite in a week.)

Responsibilities:
- Establish liaison with and elicit requirements from business stakeholders and external clients.
- Document business processes based on global standards and client/customer requirements.
- Document functional and technical specifications for developers, esp. system integration mapping documentation.
- Demonstrate solutions to stakeholders to validate technical solutions.
- Ensure quality standards are met for all project deliverables.

Skill/Experience/Education:
- 8-10 yrs exp with requirements elicitation, specification, documentation, and communication.
- Experience with supply chain management, order management, warehouse management business processes.
- Experience with Softeon warehouse management system or similar enterprise warehouse management system. Will be required to become a proficient application user.

Mandatory:
- Excellent verbal and written skills. Must be clear in communications with stakeholders. Strong documentation skills – needs advanced skills with Microsoft Office. Detailed oriented, organized, self-sufficient.
- Experience with A2A, B2B, B2C data mapping analysis.
- Strong experience with X12, SAP IDoc, XML, JSON messaging formats.

Desired:
- Experience as a user with SAP SD, IM, MM.
- Experience with application testing and process analysis.
- Agile and Waterfall software methodologies.
- Experience with computer system validation for the Healthcare industry.
